author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...STRONG WINDS SPREAD ALONG THE EAST COAST OF FLORIDA AS THE CENTER  OF MILTON NEARS CAPE CANAVERAL... ...400 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...STRONG WINDS SPREAD ALONG THE EAST COAST OF FLORIDA AS THE CENTER  OF MILTON NEARS CAPE CANAVERAL... ...400 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 4:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 10
 the center of Milton was located near 28.5, -80.7
 with movement NE at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 977 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Milton (AT4/AL142024)
